title: Chicory, apple and watercress salad
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon cottage cheese', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon cider vinegar', '1 tablespoon walnut oil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 chicory, trimmed and leaves separated', '1 apple, thinly sliced', '15g stemmed watercress leaves', '60g chopped walnuts', '4 tablespoons crumbled blue cheese']
